dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.principal_name: Football Data Co and The Football Association

works.description:
Dear Sirs,

NetResult Internal Reference: DataCo CaseID-131247

We write on behalf of Football Data Co Limited which is the appointed  
licensee of the FA Premier League, the Football League, the Scottish  
Premier League and the Scottish Football League ("the Leagues") in respect
 
of the protection and licensing of certain intellectual property rights of
 
the Leagues, including those in UK Football Club Crests, for use by third 

parties.

It has come to our attention that images of UK Football Club Crests are  
being used in the cake designs displayed on your website via
